sub-flow.name: sf_commonFlowLogRequest

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Generate Generic Error Message
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/json --- { type: "System Error", status: flowVars.status, statusCode: flowVars.statusCode, message: flowVars.exceptionMsg }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Business Exception
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/json --- { "type": "Business Exception", "status": "422", statusCode: flowVars.statusCode, message: flowVars.exceptionMsg }
